name: jsoi
description: A minimalistic, zero dependency javascript library that can perform string interpolation recursively over javascript objects preserving types. Great for dynamic configuration loading, supports asynchronous loading of objects with user defined callbacks in NodeJS or in a browser.

scripts.prepare_interpolation_objects: npm run build_interpolation_objects && npm run rename_target_interpolation_objects
scripts.prepare_non_min: npm run create_global_scope_module_loader && npm run prepare_interpolation_objects && npm run copy_interpolation_file
scripts.prepare_interpolation_objects_min: npm run minify_interpolation_objects && npm run rename_target_interpolation_objects_min
scripts.prepare_min: npm run prepare_interpolation_objects_min && npm run prepare_global_scope_loader_min
scripts.copy_supporting_docs: npm run copy_license && npm run copy_readme && npm run copy_icons
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepare_min && npm run prepare_non_min && npm run copy_supporting_docs
